entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ComInterfaceGenerator should generate a free of the local variable in the catch clause of unmanagedToManaged stubs, and free the old parameter value in the AssignOut stage #89483
  • Consider moving some bits of Emscripten property checks and setup to the WorkloadManifest package. #89482
  • StreamWriter might not call Flush #89480
  • [API Proposal]: Add CloseAsync to Stream #89479
  • [Analyzer]: Recommend usage of constant in `stackalloc` expressions #89478
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync with thread-local state just like Parallel.ForEach #89476
  • HasNativeCodeReJitAware #89475
    8.0.0
  • Have AreOptimizationsDisabled to go through DAC #89474
    8.0.0
  • chrome-DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests crashing in CI #89470
    8.0.0
  • [runtime-sanitized]: ASAN default options not being respected on NativeAOT smoke tests on Linux #89468
  • [libs][iOS] TimeZoneInfo StandardName/DisplayName display abbreviations instead of full name #89466
    8.0.0
  • Different marshaller structs should be used for unmarshalling and marshalling elements in UnmanagedToManaged stubs #89463
  • Track stateful marshallers for each element in unmanaged to managed stubs #89462
    Future
  • Warning when using a collection initializer with more elements than specified in the capacity #89461
  • JIT: Local morph GetElement/WithElement handling for Vector3 does not handle larger SIMD sources #89456
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Possible algorithm improvement for method lookup #89455
    Future
  • [WASM][Debugger]Test timed out: DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpoint #89453
  • Test failure: HttpMetricsTest_Http*.CurrentRequests_InstrumentEnabledAfterSending_NotRecorded #89451
    8.0.0
  • Managed Memory Leak on NET for ManagementClass #89450
  • Injected or scoped ServiceProvider does not support Keyed services #89447
  • Keyed services aren't working with HttpClientBuilder #89446
  • Fix SafeHandle usage in System.IO.Compression #89445
  • [Mono] Windows static library runtime build exports MONO_API functions. #89444
  • [Test Failure] Long Running Test: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_Sync.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_LargeMultiBufferSends #89440
  • Implement Generic support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #89439
    Future
  • [nativeaot][maccat] Add Native AOT runtime tests coverage on maccatalyst platforms #89437
    9.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] DynamicGenerics tests failed on apple mobile platforms #89436
    8.0.0
  • Problem with GLIBC_2.34 on Ubuntu.22.04-x64 #89471
  • [mono][ios] MarshalingPInvokeScanner fails with PE image does not have metadata #89429
    8.0.0
  • A really obscure System.IO.Pipes issue that appeared on .NET 6 #89427
  • [browser] mono runtime already exited with 0 #89425
    8.0.0
  • The `FindPythonInterp` will be removed by cmake #89424
  • Empty `_.pdb` files are included in the artifacts produced by build of the runtime repo #89423
  • System.Xml.Serialization: Add ability to omit setting nullable IList types to new() #89420

Closed

  • [wasm] Improve the UX for using codespaces to run library tests, and debug #70122
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Cannot installs `wasm-tools` for Wasm.Build.Tests on macOS/arm64 #78626
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] v8 crashing at the end with "Reached heap limit" - for AOT builds #88497
    8.0.0
  • [browser][build][libraries] Properties are not propagated from nested build upwards #82819
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure that proxy ports can be configured from command line, and make the parameters discoverable #70680
    8.0.0
  • [tracking] Publish .NET assemblies in Webcil files #80807
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmTemplateTests for console failing due to truncated output #71887
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable wasm relinking for Trimming tests running in `dotnet-linker-tests` #49790
    8.0.0
  • Slow CPU-Intensive Calculations #45363
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Test the templates in VS and VS for Mac #64336
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM AOT .NET 6 performance degradation on Safari, iPhone 6, iOS 15.1 #61373
    8.0.0
  • `dotnet` exits with exit code `139` on linux, with a core file dumped #68393
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Publish Emscripten Deadlocked #68708
    8.0.0
  • Cross-gen failed to produce PDB for C# Dev Kit binaries #89337
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.Tests` - assertion - `src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:926` #89398
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT and SIMD - suboptimal codegen when performing bitmask comparisons #10560
    Future
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should warn when a collection's element marshaller is stateful #89465
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Implement support for UnsafeAccessorAttribute #86040
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Make runtime errors from simd and exception handling failures easy to understand #84574
    8.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] Failing Vector64/128 tests #87164
    8.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName OID 2.5.4.97 issue on Windows #89434
  • Tracing GC on iOS yields mono_coop_cond_signal Cannot transition thread 0x2016c7280 from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #88642
    8.0.0
  • fgVNBasedIntrinsicExpansionForCall_ReadUtf8 supports only ASCII #89375
    8.0.0
  • Codespaces prebuild often fails with msbuild "Child node "2" exited prematurely" #73774
    8.0.0
  • mono runtime using 3rd Party library internal invoke native code lead app crash #78205
    8.0.0
  • E2E scenario: ASP.NET minimal Web API applications can be NativeAOT compiled for size and performance #75621
    8.0.0
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor to a virtual method on a base class through a derived type asserts #89212
    8.0.0
  • .NET Runtime missing prompt is not redirecting to the correct runtime URL #36765
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Support UnsafeAccessorAttribute method calls with custom modifiers #89098
    8.0.0
  • Host work in .NET 8 #77456
    8.0.0
  • Framework resolution should perform basic validation of frameworks #48180
    8.0.0
  • Ability to customize the runtime location for framework-dependent apps (apphost) #70975
    Future
  • .NET 8: Host improvements #71284
    8.0.0
  • Is it static link only of mono aot on windows? #79214
    9.0.0
  • [Mono-Arm64] Improved application throughput performance implementing hardware specific optimizations #70562
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Improvement: avoid deep recursion in mono_ssa_rename_vars #60266
    8.0.0
  • fill the mono_alc_get_ambient with right behavior #62099
    8.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Profiled AOT generates "empty" shared libraries #61415
    8.0.0
  • In mono arm64, when creating a delegate that returns 16byte-size-struct, the generated code is wrong #60282
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Exceptions not being thrown for certain misuses of threading primitives #34366
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.EnumConverterTests.NegativeEnumValue_CultureInvariance #86417
    8.0.0
  • Linux Release AllSubsets_Mono_LLVMFullAot_RuntimeTests llvmfullaot fails on CI #79255
    8.0.0
  • Blazor wasm aot is not ahead of time #89403
  • [MONO][Perf] Linux/x64: 151 Regressions on 9/30/2022 2:28:26 AM #76913
  • Native Runtime Repository Crash Issue #76938
  • [release/6.0] Doublelinklist GC failures on Mono #83245
  • [6.0] Some more doublinklist failures in mono minijit and llvmaot arm64 linux #83424
  • [CoreCLR] Implement support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #86161
    8.0.0
  • Timeout running `System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CustomConverterTests.GetConverter_Poco_WriteThrowsNotSupportedException` on mono interpreter #66371
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in IfStatements.IfStatements and Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<SimpleStructWithProperties> #80565
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests.Perf_Reader #82107
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Tests #83398
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<HashSet<String>> #83523
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 6/7/2023 7:43:49 PM #87639
    8.0.0
  • APPLICATION_HANG_cfffffff_coreclr.dll!Thread::DoAppropriateWaitWorker #89297
  • Regressions in FrozenDictionary #88202
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 34 Regressions on 9/9/2022 1:01:45 PM #75544
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String> and System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<Int32> #88378
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<String, String> #81553
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Refactor `System.Linq.Expressions` private feature switches #89171
    8.0.0
  • [browser][nodejs] RequestDuration_CustomTags_Recorded - ENOENT: no such file or directory, open 'http://127.0.0.1:45051/' #88900
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Update documentation when building native libraries with a custom native host #82156
    Future
  • All Vector<T> operators use software fallbacks when AVX is not presented #89408
    8.0.0
  • Cryptographic error "Padding is invalid and cannot be removed" #88070
  • System.Reflection on NET Self Contained app fails with TypeLoadException (net fx based assembly) #88496
  • superpmi: DeprecationWarning running superpmi.py #84710
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix opt-cross-module using non version safe tokens #89481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Make a copy of 'clrjit' binary for use in SuperPMI collect to avoid heap errors when the same 'clrjit' binary is used #89473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Look for Native Signal SIMD Context #89467
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove net7 nuget feeds #89460
    needs-area-label
  • Add CollectionBuilder attribute to some immutable collection interfaces #89459
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Avoid some rune iteration in GetEncodedTruncatedBytesFromString #89458
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix STJ source gen support for System.BinaryData. #89454
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [HTTP] Catch and ignore exception from an external server #89452
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve case-insensitive prefix extraction in Regex #89449
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix a couple of replay bugs #89443
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix for EventPipe ep_rt_temp_path_get off by 1 issue. #89438
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Do not set -msimd128 in the default rsp #89433
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][llvm][jit] Adding support for Vector128::ExtractMostSignificantBits intrinsic on ARM64 with LLVM + refactoring miniJIT opcodes #89431
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] MarshalingPInvokeScanner tolerates DLLs without metadata #89430
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add explicit conversion of floating-point call args #89428
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors within the CLFS linux #89422
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #89421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Setting RequiredMemberAttribute usage as inherited. #89418
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2229389 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • Include TypeNameBuilder.cs from CoreLib instead of copying the file over #89144
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Delete an unused `Span` class from `object.h` #89464
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix failure to generate ngen pdb in crossgen #89415
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable gsharing when Unsafe.ReadUnaligned/WriteUnaligned () i… #89417
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Address unused suppressions #89216
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] detect SIMD and EH support #89387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] only trace ExitStatus stack trace if `diagnosticTracing` is true #89432
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Filter list of candidate invocations for parsing in binding generator #89266
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove nullable return from ConstructorInvoker.Invoke() #89448
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support non-ascii in fgVNBasedIntrinsicExpansionForCall_ReadUtf8 #89383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Run Antigen/Fuzzlyn on Saturdays too #89426
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Get the normal event accessors generated #89441
    linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Fixes for outerloop-mono.yml #88743
    area-Build-mono
  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Disable failing Utf8JsonWriter test. #89442
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable Mono for using faster invoke stubs #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] WBT fixes, and rationalization to allow improved testing #89360
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding test for #80049 #89399
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • FIX #87983 - Enable events for LogAlways #89326
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix System.BinaryData tests failing in AOT. #89381
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Refactor System.Linq.Expressions feature switches #89308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] fix NodeJS fetch detection #89393

    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete NativeAOT_StaticInitialization #89291
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove InstructionSet_VectorT256 if AVX2 is disabled via env var #89413
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make textual stack trace metadata smaller #89377
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed python warning: DeprecationWarning: There is no current event loop #89404

Updated

  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

  • Dynamic events #89371

    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
